name: Charrua Soccer
description:
You can play single player (player VS computer), two players (player VS player), or Competitions.

Play Modes:

  1. Friendly Match

  2. Competitions

  3. Penalty Match

  4. Party Tournament

The supported competitions are:

  • Global Cup

  • American Cup

  • European Cup

  • Women's Global Cup

  • Global Cup 1930 (evoking the first international cup with a retro look)

  • Charrua Cups (men and women)

  • Charrua League B

  • Charrua League A

  • Charrua Tournament

Features:

  • Simplified controls for casual players.

  • Simple to pick up and enjoy, with a clean and challenging gameplay.

  • Retro style 3D art resembling old games and evoking nostalgia.

  • Party modes: Play with your friends in different game modes.

  • Penalties!

  • Women’s Soccer.

  • Deep gameplay: short pass, long pass, etc., aiming when shooting, controlled shoot or lobs, player skills, fouls, yellow and red cards, etc.

  • Lots of Animations (overhead kick, scorpion kick, scissors kick, diving header, etc.)

  • Challenging AI. Teams with very different game playing styles (ie: Catenaccio from Italy or Tiki-Taka like Brasil).

  • Many leagues and playing modes.

Whether you are a soccer fan or not so much, this game will keep you entertained for hours!

Do you have what it takes to become a champion?
